info.author: ixi-software
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
info.description:
Mirra is a 2D OpenGL python library. It defines a set of classes to render
primitive shapes (Text, Pixel, Line, Circle, Rect, Arc, Bitmap, BitmaPolygon)
and manages rendering and user input (mouse, keyboard, joystick). Mirra focuses
on interaction and implements an event listener and classes that receive mouse
events. (in a way like macromedia director or flash do).
It runs using pygame(SDL) but it can also be used under wxPython. It uses
py2app/py2exe to export applications for windows and mac. It includes SimpleOSC an
easy to use OpenSoundControl module.
info.name: Mirra
info.html_description: Mirra is a 2D OpenGL python library. It defines a set of classes to render primitive shapes (Text, Pixel, Line, Circle, Rect, Arc, Bitmap, BitmaPolygon) and manages rendering and user input (mouse, keyboard, joystick). Mirra focuses on interaction and implements an event listener and classes that receive mouse events. (in a way like macromedia director or flash do). It runs using pygame(SDL) but it can also be used under wxPython. It uses py2app/py2exe to export applications for windows and mac. It includes SimpleOSC an easy to use OpenSoundControl module.
